topic.title: Incantata - english translation
topic.body:
http://localhost:43110/19xqgCi5YTsdTxY97Pferz9GuQERzSSVFe/

Incantata is a magical card game similar to well known trading card games - exclusively on 0-Net and with a nice balance. Remember : this translation ist still "work in progress". All artwork and card-texts are free to use (CC-SA)
You can simply print it and start playing.

Here is the german site:
http://localhost:43110/13VDeMgRgGf73mHsMrrorXkq4fhUKfBvPz

1543612644_1JcvXFCv5qjJdiUo7iy5sgDDZALhh.body: Beginners who are familiar with a "well known trading card game" will feel right at home, but remember to read the rules 832-841, 826-828, 733-734 first, which will introduce you to the most important differences.
